title: Tuttle Compact Indonesian Dictionary: Indonesian-English English-Indonesian
features: is a totally new Indonesian-English/English-Indonesian dictionary. It provides Indonesian and English speakers with the very latest and most concise definitions for commonly-used Indonesian words and phrases, including thousands of new Indonesian words and expressions that have been created in the past several years.
